Reviews.Title: small big phone
Reviews.Author: denzil farray
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone for my fiance and she is loving this phone every day the design of the phone is typical samsung design great phone for the price

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with product performance
Reviews.Author: Jairo Colmenares
Reviews.Content: Very Excellent product, despite coming into the Chinese language, it was easy to change the language to Spanish. 100% operational.

Reviews.Title: Limited version of the samsung galaxy fame
Reviews.Author: Gloria Centurion
Reviews.Content: The phone it's ok but this is not a 3G cell phone for the 900 Band just works for the 2100 Band which is useless for me.

Reviews.Title: "Never Judge a book by its cover"
Reviews.Author: Lance Christian
Reviews.Content: "Never Judge a book by its cover". its small but it does alot its like paying for less and getting more, thanks guys

Reviews.Title: Clear Calls
Reviews.Author: Elisa
Reviews.Content: The are three (3) problems that I have been encountering, namely: 1) Chinese symbols pop up on the screen once in a while, 2) I need to press the letters on the keypad very well, instead of applying light touch, and 3) padlock symbol keeps popping up on the screen during the duration of the call. On the positive side, calls are clear and the cost of the phone is reasonable and worth it.

Reviews.Title: slick
Reviews.Author: EmEs
Reviews.Content: the galaxy fame is a slick phone !  i like the design of the phone and the camera works well.

Reviews.Title: Chinese Languge
Reviews.Author: Norman Marsh
Reviews.Content: The phone changes to Chinese language frequently.Tough protective skin not available.Function controls do not always work.Dictionary not adequate.

Reviews.Title: bad seller, no returns no real products.
Reviews.Author: Gian
Reviews.Content: is s6812i china economic version, no camera front, no flash no sensor aproximity, no connect at google play, no 3g. camera is 3 mp.

Reviews.Title: Very misleading
Reviews.Author: Nigel
Reviews.Content: you are shown one phone and is sold another. The pic shows a phone with flash frontal camera but they sell you one without then say they mentioned it in the description so why not show us exactly what we would be getting. Dishonest SHAME on you joycells

Reviews.Title: Great android phone
Reviews.Author: Scot
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical when I read other reviews but tried this phone anyways, and I must say that this phone is a decent phone. It is not a Galaxy s5, so if you expect this to be a top notch phone it will not be, it is a very good decent android phone, the phone performs well and is great for anyone who is a casual android user. If you want a quicker processor you will have to shell out much more dough and buy the galaxy, but for my children and myself this phone does the job and a really good price.So far I have bought this low cost Samsung and another model and both perform well with no issues.Pros: Great price and great performance.Cons: Not as quick and flashy as the $700 galaxy s5I would recommenced this phone if you want the latest but are on a budget,

Reviews.Title: simple but functional
Reviews.Author: Oliver Sureda "topper"
Reviews.Content: Is a good phone but slow. The screen have bad resolution (colors). I'm using the phone in digital Venezuela but the 3G is not working

Reviews.Title: este  telefono  movil lo necesito en español, This mobile phone I need it in Spanish
Reviews.Author: Angel Rodriguez - Caracas Venezuela
Reviews.Content: Question: buy this Samsung Galaxy fame, "GT-S6812i" I'm from Venezuela and I buy this mobile phone I need it in Spanish, the firware was mounted had the Spanish language, actualize that recommendations Kies, and updated only have 3 languages , and has the Spanish, as do help to reinstall the firware that has the Spanish.Pregunta: compre este Samsung Galaxy  fame, "GT-S6812i"  soy de venezuela y compre este  telefono  movil lo necesito en español, el firware que estaba montado tenia el idioma español, lo actualize al que recomenda Kies, y la actualizacion solo tienen 3 idiomas, y no tiene el español, ayuda como hago para instalar de nuevo el firware que tenga el español.

Reviews.Title: GT-S6812i It's Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Villavicencio
Reviews.Content: This phone comes with all the necesary for someone like me, the size is very portable, the screen have very nice resolution, and all the apps I realy need works. It work in Costa Rica with Movistar and Kolbi, have nice speed with the internet in wi-fi and other ways. The camera is poor, but I want a phone to comunicate, not to take pictures, then it's not a problem. The GPS works too.I found it comes rooted, and that gives the phone more funtionality, but for me it's better to restore to fabric before the first use, to eliminate some apps that are not necesary (unless you are in China), and as it comes rooted, you can delete other system apps that doesn't work in other countries.If you want more funtions, you have to find other model, and pay more,

Reviews.Title: A great phone and great price
Reviews.Author: Ruben Guardia
Reviews.Content: It is s a great phone and great price, I recommend it you need a small and not too expensive smartphone

Reviews.Title: Seller lied about Mobile information
Reviews.Author: Richard Atahuaman
Reviews.Content: Seller give in their advisements wrong information. They write this Samsung Galaxy Fame 3G works on 900/2100 band and when I received the mobile phones I realize the phones only works 3G in 2100 band so that I cant use my mobile phone properly because in my country 2100 band doesnt work. I dont recommed this seller

Reviews.Title: No voice to text or voice search
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth M. Strand
Reviews.Content: This phone does not come with the little microphone for voice to text or voice search!! It was like going backwards!! I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Different product
Reviews.Author: ULADZISLAU M.
Reviews.Content: It is not a Samsung Galaxy Fame S6812 smartphone (as written in the product description), but some limited version from China

Reviews.Title: Samsung galaxy fame
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: Ordered for a co-workers son she said he loved it so much he haven't put it down yet, nice alternative to the s3

Reviews.Title: Only one SIM card was standard
Reviews.Author: shipsurveyor
Reviews.Content: The seller emailed and confirmed that BOTH SIM card slots were the standard size - they weren't. One was standard the other a micro SIM card slot. This made the phone useless.

Reviews.Title: Wanted cheap dual sim android phone. GOT IT. Its in chinese though
Reviews.Author: B.O. Charles "O.Charles"
Reviews.Content: Its in Chinese...I had to play "hide and seek" with the menu before I got it in English.Even then...the default apps are for the Chinese market and I cant uninstall them.THe screen is tiny and quality is poor but very bright though.Holds two sim card lines and both are active at the same time.Wifi connection is a breeze.It does everything a full sized high end android device does save for the poor quality screen.The Chinese bit that dogs me till date is the reason for a 4 star. But not a deal breaker

Reviews.Title: Not recommended
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Buller
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone and do not like it. First of all came in another language so figured that one out. And then screen freezes  and says emergency calls only and can't get past that, contact seller about returning and they charge a restocking fee. Will never order from them again bad business'

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Jaime Giraldo
Reviews.Content: I choose 4 stars for the initial configuration because it was in chinese, but after that the cell phone was in english it was  all that i needed. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: No instructions on how to operate written in English
Reviews.Author: Excited Eunice
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my husband in East Africa. I liked it for having dual simcards, one slot was of the right size but the second one was too small, and took time to figure out that the second simcard required to be trimmed to fit in the slot. The other problem was that it could not specify which simcard belonged to which company making it really hard to operate. The battery life is also too low, cant keep charge for an entire day without charging. It also did not also have an operation manual written in English and there's none too at youtube. I was literally disappointed by this phone, I did not return it since my husband chose to keep it.

Reviews.Title: Second time in your store
Reviews.Author: Vasil Xhoxhi
Reviews.Content: That's a good think, when you are happy to return back, in the same store, for the same item. So, everybody can understand why .Thank you

ProductInfo.Features:
3G HSDPA 900/2100
QuadBand GSM
Bluetooth
Wi-Fi
Auto-focus, Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Fame 3G Smartphone Unlocked Metallic Blue QuadBand Dual Sim CellPhone HSDPA 900/2100
